languages.text: Оперативники оказывают поддержку отряду и ослабляют оборону противника. Ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Анализ целей в начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} оперативника автоматически накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g} на каждого видимого оперативником врага.

Operatives support the party and weaken the enemy's defences. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Analyse Enemies, automatically inflicts one stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on every enemy in the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.
languages.original_text: Адепты оказывают поддержку отряду и ослабляют оборону противника. Ключевая способность Изучение целей в начале каждого хода адепта автоматически накладывает уязвимость на каждого видимого адептом врага.

traits.locale_text: Adepts support the party and weaken the enemy's defences. Their keystone ability Study Enemies automatically inflicts one stack of the exploit effect on every enemy in the Adept's line of sight at the start of each of the Adept's turns.

Adepts support the party and weaken the enemy's defences. Their keystone ability Study Enemies automatically inflicts one stack of the exploit effect on every enemy in the Adept's line of sight at the start of each of the Adept's turns.

Adepts support the party and weaken the enemy's defences. Their keystone ability, Study Enemies, automatically inflicts one stack of the exploit effect on every enemy in the Adept's line of sight at the start of each of the Adept's turns.

Operatives support the party and weaken the enemy's defences. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Analyse Enemies, automatically inflicts one stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on every enemy in the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

languages.text: Agenten unterstützen die Gruppe und schwächen die Verteidigung des Feindes. Ihre wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, Feinde analysieren, verursacht automatisch einen Stapel des {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekts{/g} bei jedem Feind in der {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} des Agenten zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Agenten.
languages.original_text: Operatives support the party and weaken the enemy's defences. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Analyse Enemies, automatically inflicts one stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on every enemy in the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Adepten unterstützen die Gruppe und schwächen die Verteidigung des Feindes. Ihre wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, Feinde studieren, verursacht automatisch einen Stapel des {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekts{/g} bei jedem Feind in der {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} des Adepten zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Adepten.

languages.text: Les Opérateurs soutiennent le groupe et affaiblissent les défenses de l'ennemi. Leur {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé, Étude des Ennemis, inflige automatiquement un cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Exploit{/g} à chaque ennemi dans la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} de l'Opérateur au début de chacun de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}.
languages.original_text: Operatives support the party and weaken the enemy's defences. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Analyse Enemies, automatically inflicts one stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on every enemy in the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les Adeptes soutiennent le groupe et affaiblissent les défenses de l'ennemi. Leur {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé, Étude des Ennemis, inflige automatiquement un cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Exploit{/g} à chaque ennemi dans la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} de l'Adepte au début de chacun de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}.

Les Adeptes soutiennent le groupe et affaiblissent les défenses de l'ennemi. Leur {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé, Étude des Ennemis, inflige automatiquement un cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Exploit{/g} à chaque ennemi dans la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} de l'Adepte au début de chacun de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}.

languages.text: 特工可以为队伍提供加成效果，削弱敌人的防御。特工的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：分析敌人，会自动叠加{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。特工每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都会自动对{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的所有敌人施加1层“研究”效果。
languages.original_text: Operatives support the party and weaken the enemy's defences. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Analyse Enemies, automatically inflicts one stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on every enemy in the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 技师可以为队伍提供加成效果，削弱敌人的防御。技师的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：研究敌人，会自动叠加{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}{/g}。技师每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都会自动对{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的所有敌人施加1层“研究”效果。

languages.text: Los agentes sirven de apoyo para el grupo y debilitan las defensas del enemigo. Su {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave, Analizar enemigos, inflige automáticamente una acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Vulnerabilidad{/g} a todos los enemigos que estén en la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del adepto al comenzar cada uno de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g}.
languages.original_text: Operatives support the party and weaken the enemy's defences. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Analyse Enemies, automatically inflicts one stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on every enemy in the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los adeptos sirven de apoyo para el grupo y debilitan las defensas del enemigo. Su {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave, Estudiar enemigos inflige automáticamente una acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Vulnerabilidad{/g} a todos los enemigos que estén en la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del adepto al comenzar cada uno de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g}.

languages.original_text: Adepts support the unit and weaken enemy defences. The key ability Explore targets at the beginning of each adept's turn automatically imposes vulnerability on every enemy visible to the adept.

languages.text: オペレーターはパーティーを支援し敵の防御を弱体化する。彼らの主要な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は敵の調査であり、これはオペレーターの各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に自動的に1スタック分の{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}をオペレーターの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線上{/g}の全ての敵に与える。
languages.original_text: Operatives support the party and weaken the enemy's defences. Their keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Analyse Enemies, automatically inflicts one stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} on every enemy in the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

traits.locale_text: アデプトは、パーティーを支援し敵の防御を弱体化することができる。彼らの主要な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は敵の調査であり、アデプトの各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に自動的に1スタック分の{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}をアデプトの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}上の全ての敵に与えることができる。
